descriptionHtml:
This app has the best of 4K (Ultra HD) as well as Full HD (High Definition) Basketball Wallpapers.

No need to look for more Basketball Wallpaper apps. We add new Top Quality 4K | Full HD All Star Players Pictures everyday! This application is a great tool for 4K | Full HD Basketball Teams Backgrounds. The app is designed for Android phones & tablets, so it works greatly on any screen size or screen resolution.

Features of this app:

👉 Popular Wallpapers:
- You can get the most popular Basketball Wallpapers.

👉 Favorites:
- All your favorite backgrounds are placed under one roof.

👉 Collections:
- All the wallpapers ordered by image quality, to make it easy for the users to find any 4k Wallpaper they would like to have on their phones.

👉 Share & Set As:
- You can easily share Ultra HD Wallpapers with anyone with just one click. Set wallpapers to your desktop as well with one click.

👉 Save:
- You can save any of these Full HD / 4K Walls in your phone for FREE.
